EmailTemplate.name: Order Ful Product Delivered - SocialOrder Fulfillment Post_Working with a Winner
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Five Star Professional working with a winner social post has been published!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}:
A new social post has been published for you! Please check out your new post online and share it directly to your network to optimize the views and interactions.
Your post can be viewed here: {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Additionally, we encourage you to share the following announcement email with your clients and network. Just copy/paste the content below into an email or other digital announcement platform to share.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to your Client Success Representative, {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Fullname__c}, at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Phone__c} or by email at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Email__c}.
Thank you, Five Star Professional Client Success Team
____________________________-
At Five Star Professional, we work with thousands of outstanding professionals from across the country each year. One winner that I would like to call special attention to is {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_Last_Name__c}. {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} is a {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} winner of our {!Fulfillment__c.Associated_With__c} award in {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Region__c}.
One attribute common to all of our award winners is a dedication to service. {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} has stood out in this regard, as well. Because service is so central to our award, we believe that potential clients would be wise to work with a winner! For more information on {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}, check out this social post.
{!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c} (Copy and paste the link into your browser)
Jonathan Wesser Five Star Professional VP, Research
